title: Gadiyara
text:
Gadiyara is a 2020 Indian <a href="Kannada">Kannada</a>-language thriller film directed by Prabhik Mogaveer. The film featured <a href="Raj%20Deepak%20Shetty">Raj Deepak Shetty</a>, Sheethal Shetty, <a href="Sharath%20Lohithaswa">Sharath Lohitashwa</a> and <a href="Suchendra%20Prasad">Suchendra Prasad</a> as lead characters. The music is composed by Raghav Subhash.
Plot.
Professor (<a href="Sharath%20Lohithaswa">Sharath Lohitashwa</a>) who conspiracy to steal treasures hidden in various places during the time of the[kings. Police officer (<a href="Raj%20Deepak%20Shetty">Raj Deepak Shetty</a>) chasing the case. Students who become police guests unconsciously. A professor is arrested by a police officer over a report by a journalist (Sheetal Shetty) that the students in the custody. However, the core of the report is not left to the directors alone.
